sequence:
Émile, the Dancing Angel

<size=45>Chapter 2 - A Fellowship of Gold?</size>

scripts.say: Port - Commander's Office
Edinburgh was in the office, and it seemed like she wanted to meet Émile.
Hey, Émile, I'm here to chat~
Bienvenue, Edinburgh! Sorry, but we'll have to talk later, I've got my hands full with secretary work... Right, Commander?
Knowing you, you could get it done in a minute~ Believe it or not, I'm quite a good judge of character!
Have you two always been this close...?
Don't you know, Commander? We both transported gold during the war!
That's right! She transported more gold than I did, but my gold transport is way more discussion-worthy!
Aw, that determination to never be outdone of yours is so cute♪
Turns out Edinburgh's judgment was right; Émile finished her secretary work in a flash.
You're so talented, Émile... It reminds me of a pesky maid I know...
You mean Belfast? Good heavens, no~ I don't hold a candle to her.
Speaking of Belfast, I somehow get the impression that she's your big sister...
She's my LITTLE sister! I can't believe even YOU'RE saying that now!
And I don't expect you to understand the complicated feeling that is having a little sister who's so good at everything!
I'll admit that's true. But I think you have a more colorful character than her.
Not sure if I should take that as a compliment...
On another topic: have you heard of the Land of Gold, Edinburgh?
I read about it in a travel journal once. It said the Sakura Empire is a kingdom enveloped in gold! Fascinating, isn't it? Don't you want to see it in person?
We could just ask our Sakura Empire fleetmates about it...
Still, the land of the Sakura Empire certainly is a mystical place... I suppose I want to visit it someday.

Okay, then let's ask the Commander to assign us on the team next time there's a mission in the Sakura Empire's territory! Oh, just hearing the rumors about the Sakura Empire, the Land of Gold, makes me giddy!
Definitely! The idea of it is pretty exciting!
Seems their fellowship of gold will continue for quite some time.
